headline: AM Best Assigns Issue Credit Rating to MetLife, Inc.’s New Subordinated Debentures
summary: OLDWICK, N.J., February 26, 2026--AM Best has assigned a Long-Term Issue Credit Rating of "bbb+" (Good) to the newly issued $1 billion, 5.85% subordinated debentures, due March 15, 2056, issued by MetLife, Inc. (MetLife) (headquartered in New York, NY) [NYSE: MET]. The outlook assigned to this Credit Rating (rating) is stable. All other ratings of MetLife and its subsidiaries remain unchanged.
